function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Upgrade filters to merv, inspect and maintain local exhaust ventilation","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Circulate outside air, increase exhaust ventilation, use portable hepa air cleaners","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of effective tb infection control measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of exposure limits and safety protocols for uv light and ionizer use","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaluating and modifying hiv care programs to reduce congregating of highly susceptible individuals, implementing effective air purification systems, prompt diagnosis and treatment","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Repositioning exhaust vents to ensure proper air circulation and ventilation.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Replacing wire mesh floors with solid floors or implementing additional infection control measures.","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict protocols for uv light maintenance, monitoring uv exposure levels, and providing protective measures for healthcare staff and patients.","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and inspection of uv lights and fans to ensure proper functioning","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement effective infection control measures in the control group, such as uv lights or ionizers","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of infection control protocols, isolation, and personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specialized air filtration systems and regular testing for tb in the chambers","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Separation of tb-infected animals, regular testing, and infection control measures","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of the built environment, use of uvgi disinfection systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting further research to determine the most effective air purification technology for tb prevention","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of upper-room uv light or negative air ionization as control measures.","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expert installation and post-installation checking of uv fields to ensure no excess uv light is reflected downwards. use of shielded uv fixtures.","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Appropriate positioning and installation of modern, shielded uv fixtures. checking of uv fields to ensure no excess uv light is reflected downwards. use of personal uv meters to measure exposures.","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of upper-room uv light implement alternative technologies or grounding methods to mitigate static charge interference.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement effective prevention measures for tb transmission, including environmental control measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Additional studies to characterize true
